data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Gremio drive upfield and Alisson gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fortaleza defender.
In the minute 3, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
Fortaleza pushes forward through Osvaldo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 4, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Gremio.
Throw-in high up the field for Gremio in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 9, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
Fortaleza have a goal kick.
Fortaleza will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Gremio.
In the minute 10, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a throw-in for Gremio, close to Fortaleza's area.
Gremio's David Braz misses with an attempt on goal.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
In the minute 14, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Darlan Mendes of Gremio gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Goal! Fortaleza have got their heads in front thanks to a Osvaldo strike.
In the minute 17, That's a fine assist from Juninho.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Fortaleza.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 24, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Gremio's half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Alisson of Gremio smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 30, Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Porto Alegre Gremio drive forward through Alisson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick Gremio.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 33, The home team have replaced Maicon with Robinho. This is the first substitution made today by Renato Gaucho.
Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Fortaleza.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Arena do Gremio.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Fortaleza in their own half.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Fortaleza at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick in a good position for Gremio!
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Gremio just outside Fortaleza's area.
Gremio are pushing forward but Alisson's finish is wide of the goal.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira awards Fortaleza a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Arena do Gremio.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Gremio throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
The home team replace Isaque with Luiz Fernando.
Penalty! Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira points to the spot, great chance for Gremio...
Diego Souza (Gremio) has missed a penalty!
In the minute 52, Diego Souza levels the score at 1-1.
Robinho (Gremio) has received a yellow card from Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 55, In Porto Alegre, Alisson of Gremio is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Fortaleza needs to be cautious. Gremio have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gremio push forward at Arena do Gremio and Alisson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fortaleza defence.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira.
In the minute 59, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 64, Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Gremio territory.
Important block from the Fortaleza defence as Luiz Fernando fires in a strike for Gremio.
In the minute 67, Everton (Gremio) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Gremio are coming forward and Luiz Fernando gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
In the minute 68, Fortaleza have a dangerous throw-in.
Luiz Fernando Gremio.
Gabriel Dias (Fortaleza) has been sent off!
In the minute 72, Rogerio Ceni is making the team's first substitution at Arena do Gremio with Yuri Cesar replacing David.
Marlon is replacing Wellington Paulista for Fortaleza at Arena do Gremio.
Gremio have a goal kick.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 77, Fortaleza's Ronald has been booked in Porto Alegre.
Derley is on a sub for Osvaldo for Fortaleza.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a Gremio throw-in in Fortaleza's half.
Attention is being given to Gremioâ€™s Luis Orejuela and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Arena do Gremio, Derley has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 86, Gremio's Luis Orejuela is on target but unsuccessful.
Gremio's Luis Orejuela looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Gremio's Alisson gets in a shot on goal at Arena do Gremio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 86, Corner awarded to Gremio.
Gremio drive forward but Luis Orejuela is judged offside.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Felipe Alves.
In the minute 87, Rogerio Ceni (Fortaleza) is making a fourth substitution, with Luiz Henrique replacing Ronald.
Bruno Melo is replacing Carlinhos for the away team.
Felipe Alves returns to the field for Fortaleza after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Gremio.
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
Igor Junio Benevenuto de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gremio to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Goal kick for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Fortaleza.
In Porto Alegre Gremio's Diego Souza is caught offside.
Throw-in Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Porto Alegre. The final score is 1-1.
Renato Gaucho is making the team's third substitution at Arena do Gremio with Ferreira replacing Everton.
Luis Orejuela, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Guilherme Azevedo is the substitute for Gremio.
